namespace = ftm_rent

# 1хх - для cлота 1
# 2хх - для cлота 2
# 3хх - для cлота 3
# 4хх - для cлота 4
# 5хх - для cлота 5
# 6хх - для cлота 6

# 1 - окно выбора флота для аренды
# 2 - настройка стартовой цены аренды
# 3 - запрос подтверждения аренды
# 4 - выставление на рынок
# 5 - сообщение при недостатке энергии для покупки
# 6 - настройка срока аренды
# 8 - обратный отсчет счетчика срока аренды
# 9 - обратный отсчет счетчика времени слота
# 10 - сообщение с информацией о флоте
# 11 - сообщение с информацией о аренде
# 12 - сообщение с информацией об успешной продаже флота (+ начисление денег продавцу)
# 13 - сообщение что продать флот не удалось
# 14 - сообщение об окончании аренды
# 15 - арендуемый флот уничтожен
# 16 - сообщение что наш флот на аренде уничтожен
# 17 - сообщение что мы уничтожили флот взятый в аренду
# 18 - определение размера компенсации
# 19 - подтверждение размера компенсации
# 20 - сообщение что с нас потребовали компенсацию
# 21 - сообщение что нам запретили арендовать флоты этой империи
# 22 - сообщение что не хватает энергии на компенсацию
# 23 - сообщение что нам выплатили компенсацию
# 24 - сообщение что нам отказались платить компенсацию
# 70 - ежемесячная проверка наличия флота на продаже
# 71 - проверка наличия энергокредитов
# 72 - проверка необходимости покупки
# 80 - ежегодная проверка условий продажи для ии
# 81 - выставление флота на продажу (ИИ)
# 98 - сообщение-уведомление о конце аренды
# 99 - сообщение-уведомление



# 900 - создание империи "рынок"
# 901 - окно дипломатии с Рынком
# 999 - открытие интерфейса рынка

###     ####  #####  ###    #     #####     ###
###                                         ###
###############################################


# 1 - окно выбора флота для аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.101
	title = "ftm_rent.101.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.101.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_02
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_02_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_02 
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_02
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_03
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_03_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_02 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_03
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_02 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_03
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_04
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_04_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_02 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_03
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_04
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_02 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_03
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_04
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_05
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_05_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
		log = "[Root.GetName] запустил аренда флота"
		set_variable = {
			which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual
			value = 100
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 1
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.101.fleet_01
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.101.fleet_01.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01 
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 1 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_01 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.102 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 2
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.101.fleet_02
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.101.fleet_02.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_02
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 2 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_02.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_02 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.102 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 3
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.101.fleet_03
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.101.fleet_03.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_03
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 3 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_03.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_03 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.102 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 4
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.101.fleet_04
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.101.fleet_04.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_04
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 4 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_04.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_04 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.102 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 5
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.101.fleet_05
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.101.fleet_05.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_05 
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 5 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_05.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_05 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.102 }
		}
	}
		
	# передумал
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.101.nope
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал передумал продавать флот"
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_in_progress	
		}
	}
	
}





# 2 - ручная настройка стартовой цены аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.102
	title = "ftm_rent.102.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.102.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	# -10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.102.minus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.102.minus10000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual
				value >= 10001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual
				value = -10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.102 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] снижает цену на 10000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# -1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.102.minus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.102.minus1000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual
				value >= 1001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual
				value = -1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.102 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] снижает цену на 1000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# -100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.102.minus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.102.minus100.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual
				value >= 101
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual
				value = -100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.102 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] снижает цену на 100 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# +100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.102.plus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.102.plus100.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual
				value = 100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.102 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] увеличивает цену на 100 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# +1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.102.plus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.102.plus1000.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual
				value = 1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.102 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] увеличивает цену на 1000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# +10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.102.plus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.102.plus10000.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual
				value = 10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.102 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] увеличивает цену на 10000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# done
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.102.done
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.102.done.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			# счетчик текущей цены
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
				value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost_manual
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value = 12
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.106 }
			log = "[Root.GetName] выставляет флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] на аренда за стартовую цену: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost]. Нужно выбрать срок аренды"
		}
	}
	
	
	
}





# 3 - запрос подтверждения продажи
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.103
	title = "ftm_rent.103.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.103.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
		
	# подтвердить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.103.confirm
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.103.confirm.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] подтверждает продажу флота [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] через аренду"
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.104 }
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_in_progress
			set_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = { 
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rent_country
				set_event_locked = yes
				fleet_event = { id = ftm_rent.199 }
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rent_slot_1_time_in_months
				value = 60
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = root modifier = ftm_rent_sanction }
				}
				set_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
			}
		}
	}
		
	# отказаться
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.103.nope
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал передумал выставлять флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] на аренду"
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_in_progress	
		}
	}
	
}





# 4 - выставление на продажу
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.104
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
	
		# ОБНУЛЕНИЕ СЧЕТЧИКОВ
		event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
			# корветы (corvette)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_corvette_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# эсминцы (destroyer)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_destroyer_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# крейсера (cruiser)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cruiser_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# линкоры (battleship)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_battleship_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# титаны (titan)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_titan_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
		}
		
		# ПРИСВОЕНИЕ СЧЕТЧИКОВ		
		
		# корветы (corvette)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_corvette_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 
				}
			}	
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_corvette_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# эсминцы (destroyer)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_destroyer_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_destroyer_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# крейсера (cruiser)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_cruiser_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cruiser_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# линкоры (battleship)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_battleship_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 
				}
				
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_battleship_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# титаны (titan)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_titan_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = {
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_titan_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}





# 5 - сообщение при недостатке энергии для покупки
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.105
	title = "ftm_rent.105.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.105.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.105.ok
	}
}





# 6 - настройка срока аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.106
	title = "ftm_rent.106.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.106.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	# -12
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.106.minus12
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.106.minus12.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value >= 24
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value = -12
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.106 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] снижает срок аренды на 12 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# -6
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.106.minus6
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.106.minus6.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value >= 18
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value = -6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.106 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] снижает срок аренды на 6 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# -3
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.106.minus3
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.106.minus3.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value >= 15
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value = -3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.106 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] снижает срок аренды на 3 месяца. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# +3
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.106.plus3
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.106.plus3.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value <= 57
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value = 3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.106 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] повышает срок аренды на 3 месяца. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# +6
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.106.plus6
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.106.plus6.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value <= 54
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value = 6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.106 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] повышает срок аренды на 6 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# +12
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.106.plus12
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.106.plus12.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value <= 48
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value = 12
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.106 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] повышает срок аренды на 12 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# done
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.106.done
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.106.done.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			# счетчик текущего срока аренды
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.103 }
			log = "[Root.GetName] выставляет флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] на аренду за цену: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost] на срок: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime] месяцев. Нужно подтверждение"
		}
	}
}





# 8 - обратный отсчет счетчика времени срока аренды
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.108
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
						value >= 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
					value = -1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
						value < 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
				remove_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_sleet_slot_1
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
				fleet_event = { id = ftm_rent.198 }
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.114 }
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.114 }
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
			}
		}
	}
}





# 9 - обратный отсчет счетчика времени слота
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.109
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rent_slot_1_time_in_months
						value >= 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rent_slot_1_time_in_months
					value = -1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rent_slot_1_time_in_months
						value < 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = { 
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
				set_event_locked = no
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.113 }
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
		}
	}
}





# 10 - сообщение с информацией о флоте
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.110
	title = "ftm_rent.110.title"
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
			}
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.110.desc"
	}
	# mods
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.110.desc_mod"
	}
	picture = GFX_evt_fleet_neutral 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.110.ok
	}
}





# 11 - сообщение с информацией о покупке
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.111
	title = "ftm_rent.111.title"
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
			}
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.111.desc"
	}
	# mods
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.111.desc_mod"
	}
	picture = GFX_evt_signing 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.111.ok
	}
}





# 12 - сообщение с информацией об успешной продаже флота (+ начисление денег продавцу)
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.112
	title = "ftm_rent.112.title"
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
			}
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.112.desc"
	}
	# mods
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.112.desc_mod"
	}
	picture = GFX_evt_signing 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.112.ok
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.112.ok.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {

			# присвоение денег продавцу
				
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 							
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_final_cost
					value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
				}
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName]: победила цена в [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost] энергии. Присвоение денег..."
			while = {
				count = 99
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_final_cost
								value >= 10000
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 10000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_final_cost
							value = -10000
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_final_cost
								value >= 1000
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 1000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_final_cost
							value = -1000
						}		
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_final_cost
								value >= 100
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 100 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_final_cost
							value = -100
						}
					}					
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_final_cost
								value >= 10
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 10 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_final_cost
							value = -10
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_final_cost
								value >= 1
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 1 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_final_cost
							value = -1
						}					
					}
				}
				else = {
					#nothing
				}
			}	
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName]: Присвоение денег завершено"	
		
		}
	}
}





# 13 - сообщение что продать флот не удалось
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.113
	title = "ftm_rent.113.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.113.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_hangar_bay 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.113.ok
	}
}





# 14 - сообщение об окончании аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.114
	title = "ftm_rent.114.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.114.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.114.ok
	}
}





# 15 - арендуемый флот уничтожен
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.115
	hide_window = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended
		is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer
	}

	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
				}
			}
			log = "Проверка... Флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] существует"			
		}
		else = {
			log = "Проверка... Флот слота 1 аренды уничтожен"
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_destroyed
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_destroyed
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					country_event = { id = ftm_rent.116 }
					add_opinion_modifier = {
						who = event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer
						modifier = ftm_destroy_rent_fleet
					}
				}
				event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer = { 
					country_event = { id = ftm_rent.117 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}





# 16 - сообщение что наш флот на аренде уничтожен
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.116
	title = "ftm_rent.116.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.116.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_exploding_ship 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# понять и простить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.116.ok
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer = { 
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_destroyed
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] прощает империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer.GetName] уничтожение флота"
		}
	}
	# Потребовать компенсации
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.116.money
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.118 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] требует с империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer.GetName] компенсации за уничтожение флота"
		}
	}
	# Ввести санкции
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.116.block
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.116.block_info
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.121 }
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					who = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
					modifier = ftm_rent_sanction
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_destroyed
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] запрещает империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer.GetName] арендовать свои флоты"
		}
	}
}





# 17 - сообщение что мы уничтожили флот взятый в аренду
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.117
	title = "ftm_rent.117.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.117.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_exploding_ship 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.117.ok
	}
}





# 18 - определение размера компенсации
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.118
	title = "ftm_rent.118.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.118.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
			value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
		}
	}	
	
	
	# -10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.118.minus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.118.minus10000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
				value >= 10001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
				value = -10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.118 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] снижает компенсацию на 10000 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# -1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.118.minus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.118.minus1000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
				value >= 1001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
				value = -1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.118 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] снижает компенсацию на 1000 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# -100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.118.minus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.118.minus100.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
				value >= 101
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
				value = -100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.118 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] снижает компенсацию на 100 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# +100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.118.plus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.118.plus100.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
				value = 100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.118 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] увеличивает компенсацию на 100 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# +1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.118.plus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.118.plus1000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
				value = 1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.118 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] увеличивает компенсацию на 1000 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# +10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.118.plus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.118.plus10000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
				value = 10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.118 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] увеличивает компенсацию на 10000 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# done
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.118.done
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.118.done.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.119 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] устанавливает компенсацию в размере [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation] энергии"
		}
	}
}





# 19 - подтверждение размера компенсации
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.119
	title = "ftm_rent.119.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.119.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# подтвердить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.119.confirm
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.119.confirm.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] подтверждает требование компенсации в размере [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation]"
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.120 }
			}
		}
	}
		
	# изменить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.119.nope
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] решил изменить размер компенсации"
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.118 }
		}
	}
}





# 20 - сообщение что с нас потребовали компенсацию
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.120
	title = "ftm_rent.120.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.120.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# согласиться
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.120.pay
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer.GetName] решает заплатить"

		### проверка наличиЯ энергии
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
					value = 0
				}
			}
			#1	
			while = {
				count = 99
				if = {
					limit = {
						resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 10000 }
					}
					add_resource = { energy = -10000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
							value = 10000
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 1000 }
					}
					add_resource = { energy = -1000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
							value = 1000
						}			
					}			
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
					}
					add_resource = { energy = -100 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
							value = 100
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 10 }
					}
					add_resource = { energy = -10 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
							value = 10
						}		
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 1 }
					}
					add_resource = { energy = -1 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
							value = 1
						}
					}					
				}
				else = {
					#nothing
				}
			}
			#2
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_energy_current_count
					value = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
				}
			}
			#3
			while = {
				count = 99
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
								value >= 10000
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 10000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
							value = -10000
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
								value >= 1000
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 1000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
							value = -1000
						}		
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
								value >= 100
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 100 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
							value = -100
						}
					}					
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
								value >= 10
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 10 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
							value = -10
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
								value >= 1
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 1 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_check_energy
							value = -1
						}					
					}
				}
				else = {
					#nothing
				}
			}	
			log = "[Root.GetName]: energy_check complete. ENERGY: [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_energy_current_count]."
			
			
			### 
			
			#4
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_energy_current_count
							value < ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
						}
					}
				}
				log = "Check [Root.GetName] energy: need [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation]... FAIL. NO ENERGY."
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.122 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_compensation_energy_current_count
							value >= ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
						}
					}
				}
				log = "Check [Root.GetName] energy: need [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation]... SUCCESS. ENERGY IN."
				
				
				# передача компенсации
				
				event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer = { 
				
					# снятие ресурсов			
			
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						set_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value
							value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
						}
					}
					while = {
						count = 99
						if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value
										value >= 10000
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -10000 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value
									value = -10000
								}
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value
										value >= 1000
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -1000 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value
									value = -1000
								}		
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value
										value >= 100
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -100 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value
									value = -100
								}
							}					
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value
										value >= 10
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -10 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value
									value = -10
								}
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value
										value >= 1
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -1 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value
									value = -1
								}					
							}
						}
						else = {
							#nothing
						}
					}	
				}
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					country_event = { id = ftm_rent.123 }

					# присвоение денег 

					set_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value_get
						value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
					}
					while = {
						count = 99
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value_get
									value >= 10000
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 10000 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value_get
								value = -10000
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value_get
									value >= 1000
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 1000 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value_get
								value = -1000
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value_get
									value >= 100
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 100 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value_get
								value = -100
							}				
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value_get
									value >= 10
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 10 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value_get
								value = -10
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value_get
									value >= 1
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 1 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation_value_get
								value = -1
							}	
						}
						else = {
							#nothing
						}
					}	
					log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName]: Присвоение компенсации завершено"	
				
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	# отказаться
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.120.not_pay
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer.GetName] отказывается платить"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.124 }
			}
		}
	}
}





# 21 - сообщение что нам запретили арендовать флоты этой империи
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.121
	title = "ftm_rent.121.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.121.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_alien_segregation 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.121.ok
	}
}





# 22 - сообщение что не хватает энергии на компенсацию
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.122
	title = "ftm_rent.122.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.122.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# назад
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.122.ok
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.120 }
		}
	}
}





# 23 - сообщение что нам выплатили компенсацию
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.123
	title = "ftm_rent.123.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.123.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_signing 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# назад
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.123.ok
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer = { 
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_destroyed
			}
		}
	}
}





# 24 - сообщение что нам отказались платить компенсацию
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.124
	title = "ftm_rent.124.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.124.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_assembly_fight 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# мы это запомним
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.124.ok
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer = { 
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_destroyed
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] прощает империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer.GetName] уничтожение флота и отказ платить"
		}
	}
	# Ввести санкции
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.124.block
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.124.block_info
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.121 }
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					who = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
					modifier = ftm_rent_sanction
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_destroyed
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] запрещает империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer.GetName] арендовать свои флоты"
		}
	}
}


# 70 - ежемесячная проверка наличия флота на продаже
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.170
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = ftm_rent_not_can_use_ai_buy
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time
					}
					is_ai = yes
					is_country_type = default
					used_naval_capacity_percent < 0.8
					has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 10 }
					has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 5 }
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 1 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 4 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 7 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 10 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 13 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 16 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 19 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 22 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 25 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 28 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}


# 71 - проверка наличия энергокредитов
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.171
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
			value = 0
		}
		#1	
		while = {
			count = 99
			if = {
				limit = {
					resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 10000 }
				}
				add_resource = { energy = -10000 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
						value = 10000
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 1000 }
				}
				add_resource = { energy = -1000 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
						value = 1000
					}			
				}			
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
				}
				add_resource = { energy = -100 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
						value = 100
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 10 }
				}
				add_resource = { energy = -10 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
						value = 10
					}		
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 1 }
				}
				add_resource = { energy = -1 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
						value = 1
					}
				}					
			}
			else = {
				#nothing
			}
		}
		#2
		event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_1_energy_ai_current_count
				value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
			}
		}
		#3
		while = {
			count = 99
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
							value >= 10000
						}
					}
				}
				add_resource = { energy = 10000 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
						value = -10000
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
							value >= 1000
						}
					}
				}
				add_resource = { energy = 1000 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
						value = -1000
					}		
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
							value >= 100
						}
					}
				}
				add_resource = { energy = 100 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
						value = -100
					}
				}					
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
							value >= 10
						}
					}
				}
				add_resource = { energy = 10 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
						value = -10
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
							value >= 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_resource = { energy = 1 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_check_energy_ai
						value = -1
					}					
				}
			}
			else = {
				#nothing
			}
		}	
		log = "[Root.GetName]: ЗАВЕРШЕНА ПРОВЕРКА ЭНЕРГИИ ДЛЯ ВХОДА НА АРЕНДУ. КОЛИЧЕСТВО: [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_1_energy_ai_current_count]."
		
		# проверка наличия энергии для входа на аренду
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_1_energy_ai_current_count
						value >= ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
					}
				}
			}
			log = "[Root.GetName]: средств для входа на аренду достаточно."
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.172 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_1_energy_ai_current_count
						value < ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
					}
				}
			}
			log = "[Root.GetName]: не хватает средств для входа на аренду."
			#set_timed_country_flag = { flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time days = 85 }
		}
	}
}


# 72 - проверка необходимости покупки
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.172
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = { # нормальные условия
						OR = {
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power < 2000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 25 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 10 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 1000
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 2000
									fleet_power < 5000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 40 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 20 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 1900
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 5000
									fleet_power < 10000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 50 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 30 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 3500
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 10000
									fleet_power < 25000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 75 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 40 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 6300
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 25000
									fleet_power < 50000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 50 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 11500
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 50000
									fleet_power < 100000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 150 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 75 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 21900
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 100000
									fleet_power < 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 200 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 100 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 45800
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 300 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 150 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 80000
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { # угроза - сильный сосед
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_at_war = no
								any_neighbor_country = {
									#has_communications = root
									is_country_type = default
									OR = {
										is_homicidal = yes
										AND = {
											is_rival = root
											relative_power = {
												who = root
												category = fleet
												value >= equivalent
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								has_global_flag = gray_goo_crisis_active
								NOT = {
									has_global_flag = graygoo_defeated
								}
							}
							AND = {
								has_global_flag = marauder_crisis_started
								NOT = {
									has_global_flag = great_khan_dead
								}
							}
							has_global_flag = war_in_heaven_ongoing
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power < 2000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 15 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 5 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 1500
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 2000
									fleet_power < 5000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 20 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 10 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 2850
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 5000
									fleet_power < 10000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 25 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 15 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 5250
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 10000
									fleet_power < 25000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 40 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 20 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 9450
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 25000
									fleet_power < 50000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 50 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 25 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 17250
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 50000
									fleet_power < 100000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 75 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 40 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 32850
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 100000
									fleet_power < 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 50 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 68700
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 150 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 75 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 120000
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { # кризис - война с сильным противником
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_at_war = yes
								any_war = {
									any_war_participant = {
										is_at_war_with = root
										relative_power = {
											who = root
											category = fleet
											value >= equivalent
										}
									}
								}
							}
							has_global_flag = crisis_stage_1
							has_global_flag = crisis_stage_2
							has_global_flag = crisis_stage_3
							has_global_flag = crisis_stage_4
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power < 2000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 10 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 5 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 2000
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 2000
									fleet_power < 5000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 15 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 7 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 3800
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 5000
									fleet_power < 10000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 20 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 10 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 7000
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 10000
									fleet_power < 25000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 25 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 15 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 12600
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 25000
									fleet_power < 50000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 35 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 20 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 23000
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 50000
									fleet_power < 100000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 50 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 25 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 43800
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 100000
									fleet_power < 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 75 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 35 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 91600
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 50 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 160000
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			} # конец проверки
			
			log = "[Root.GetName]: сделал покупку флота."
			save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer
			
			# передача флота и денег
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = { 
				set_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer
				set_event_locked = no
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer = { 
				set_timed_country_flag = { flag = ftm_ai_sell_block_time days = 1800 }
				set_timed_country_flag = { flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time days = 450 }
			
				# снятие ресурсов при покупке			
		
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					set_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
						value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
					}
				}	
				while = {
					count = 99
					if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
									value >= 10000
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -10000 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
								value = -10000
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
									value >= 1000
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -1000 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
								value = -1000
							}		
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
									value >= 100
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -100 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
