# 18 - определение размера компенсации
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.518
	title = "ftm_rent.518.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.518.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_compensation
			value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
		}
	}	
	
	# -10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.518.minus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.518.minus10000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
				value >= 10001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
				value = -10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.518 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.GetName] снижает компенсацию на 10000 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# -1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.518.minus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.518.minus1000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
				value >= 1001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
				value = -1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.518 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.GetName] снижает компенсацию на 1000 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# -100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.518.minus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.518.minus100.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
				value >= 101
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
				value = -100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.518 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.GetName] снижает компенсацию на 100 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# +100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.518.plus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.518.plus100.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
				value = 100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.518 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.GetName] увеличивает компенсацию на 100 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# +1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.518.plus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.518.plus1000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
				value = 1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.518 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.GetName] увеличивает компенсацию на 1000 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# +10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.518.plus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.518.plus10000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
				value = 10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.518 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.GetName] увеличивает компенсацию на 10000 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# done
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.518.done
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.518.done.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.519 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.GetName] устаннавливает компенсацию в размере [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation] энергии"
		}
	}
}





# 19 - подтверждение размера компенсации
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.519
	title = "ftm_rent.519.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.519.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# подтвердить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.519.confirm
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.519.confirm.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] подтверждает требование компенсации в размере [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation]"
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_5_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.520 }
			}
		}
	}
		
	# изменить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.519.nope
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] решил изменить размер компенсации"
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.518 }
		}
	}
}





# 20 - сообщение что с нас потребовали компенсацию
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.520
	title = "ftm_rent.520.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.520.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# согласиться
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.520.pay
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rent_slot_5_buyer.GetName] решает заплатить"

		### проверка наличиЯ энергии
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
					value = 0
				}
			}
			#1	
			while = {
				count = 99
				if = {
					limit = {
						resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 10000 }
					}
					add_resource = { energy = -10000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
							value = 10000
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 1000 }
					}
					add_resource = { energy = -1000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
							value = 1000
						}			
					}			
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
					}
					add_resource = { energy = -100 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
							value = 100
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 10 }
					}
					add_resource = { energy = -10 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
							value = 10
						}		
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 1 }
					}
					add_resource = { energy = -1 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
							value = 1
						}
					}					
				}
				else = {
					#nothing
				}
			}
			#2
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_energy_current_count
					value = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
				}
			}
			#3
			while = {
				count = 99
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
								value >= 10000
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 10000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
							value = -10000
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
								value >= 1000
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 1000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
							value = -1000
						}		
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
								value >= 100
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 100 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
							value = -100
						}
					}					
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
								value >= 10
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 10 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
							value = -10
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
								value >= 1
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 1 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_check_energy
							value = -1
						}					
					}
				}
				else = {
					#nothing
				}
			}	
			log = "[Root.GetName]: energy_check complete. ENERGY: [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_energy_current_count]."
			
			
			### 
			
			#4
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_energy_current_count
							value < ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
						}
					}
				}
				log = "Check [Root.GetName] energy: need [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation]... FAIL. NO ENERGY."
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.522 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_compensation_energy_current_count
							value >= ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
						}
					}
				}
				log = "Check [Root.GetName] energy: need [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation]... SUCCESS. ENERGY IN."
				
				
				# передача компенсации
				
				event_target:ftm_rent_slot_5_buyer = { 
				
					# снятие ресурсов			
			
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						set_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value
							value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
						}
					}
					while = {
						count = 99
						if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value
										value >= 10000
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -10000 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value
									value = -10000
								}
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value
										value >= 1000
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -1000 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value
									value = -1000
								}		
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value
										value >= 100
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -100 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value
									value = -100
								}
							}					
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value
										value >= 10
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -10 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value
									value = -10
								}
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value
										value >= 1
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -1 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value
									value = -1
								}					
							}
						}
						else = {
							#nothing
						}
					}	
				}
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					country_event = { id = ftm_rent.523 }

					# присвоение денег 

					set_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value_get
						value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation
					}
					while = {
						count = 99
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value_get
									value >= 10000
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 10000 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value_get
								value = -10000
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value_get
									value >= 1000
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 1000 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value_get
								value = -1000
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value_get
									value >= 100
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 100 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value_get
								value = -100
							}				
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value_get
									value >= 10
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 10 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value_get
								value = -10
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value_get
									value >= 1
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 1 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_compensation_value_get
								value = -1
							}	
						}
						else = {
							#nothing
						}
					}	
					log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.GetName]: Присвоение компенсации завершено"	
				
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	# отказаться
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.520.not_pay
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rent_slot_5_buyer.GetName] отказывается платить"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.524 }
			}
		}
	}
}





# 21 - сообщение что нам запретили арендовать флоты этой империи
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.521
	title = "ftm_rent.521.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.521.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_alien_segregation 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.521.ok
	}
}





# 22 - сообщение что не хватает энергии на компенсацию
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.522
	title = "ftm_rent.522.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.522.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# назад
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.522.ok
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.520 }
		}
	}
}





# 23 - сообщение что нам выплатили компенсацию
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.523
	title = "ftm_rent.523.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.523.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_signing 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# назад
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.523.ok
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_arended
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_sanction_block
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_5_buyer = { 
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_destroyed
			}
		}
	}
}





# 24 - сообщение что нам отказались платить компенсацию
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.524
	title = "ftm_rent.524.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.524.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_assembly_fight 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# мы это запомним
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.524.ok
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_arended
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_sanction_block
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_5_buyer = { 
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_destroyed
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.GetName] прощает империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_5_buyer.GetName] уничтожение флота и отказ платить"
		}
	}
	# Ввести санкции
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.524.block
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.524.block_info
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_5_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.521 }
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					who = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller
					modifier = ftm_rent_sanction
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_destroyed
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_arended
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_sanction_block
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.GetName] запрещает империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_5_buyer.GetName] арендовать свои флоты"
		}
	}
}


# 70 - ежемесячная проверка наличия флота на продаже
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.570
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_selected
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = ftm_rent_not_can_use_ai_buy
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_selected
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time
					}
					is_ai = yes
					is_country_type = default
					used_naval_capacity_percent < 0.8
					has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 10 }
					has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 5 }
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_sanction_block
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.571 days = 1 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.571 days = 4 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.571 days = 7 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.571 days = 10 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.571 days = 13 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.571 days = 16 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.571 days = 19 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.571 days = 22 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.571 days = 25 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.571 days = 28 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}


# 71 - проверка наличия энергокредитов
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.571
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_selected
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
			value = 0
		}
		#1	
		while = {
			count = 99
			if = {
				limit = {
					resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 10000 }
				}
				add_resource = { energy = -10000 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
						value = 10000
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 1000 }
				}
				add_resource = { energy = -1000 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
						value = 1000
					}			
				}			
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
				}
				add_resource = { energy = -100 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
						value = 100
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 10 }
				}
				add_resource = { energy = -10 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
						value = 10
					}		
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value >= 1 }
				}
				add_resource = { energy = -1 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
						value = 1
					}
				}					
			}
			else = {
				#nothing
			}
		}
		#2
		event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_5_energy_ai_current_count
				value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
			}
		}
		#3
		while = {
			count = 99
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
							value >= 10000
						}
					}
				}
				add_resource = { energy = 10000 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
						value = -10000
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
							value >= 1000
						}
					}
				}
				add_resource = { energy = 1000 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
						value = -1000
					}		
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
							value >= 100
						}
					}
				}
				add_resource = { energy = 100 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
						value = -100
					}
				}					
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
							value >= 10
						}
					}
				}
				add_resource = { energy = 10 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
						value = -10
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
							value >= 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_resource = { energy = 1 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_check_energy_ai
						value = -1
					}					
				}
			}
			else = {
				#nothing
			}
		}	
		log = "[Root.GetName]: ЗАВЕРШЕНА ПРОВЕРКА ЭНЕРГИИ ДЛЯ ВХОДА НА АРЕНДУ. КОЛИЧЕСТВО: [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller.ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_5_energy_ai_current_count]."
		
		# проверка наличия энергии для входа на аренду
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_5_energy_ai_current_count
						value >= ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
					}
				}
			}
			log = "[Root.GetName]: средств для входа на аренду достаточно."
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.572 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_5_energy_ai_current_count
						value < ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
					}
				}
			}
			log = "[Root.GetName]: не хватает средств для входа на аренду."
			#set_timed_country_flag = { flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time days = 85 }
		}
	}
}


# 72 - проверка необходимости покупки
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.572
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = { # нормальные условия
						OR = {
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power < 2000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 25 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 10 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 1000
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 2000
									fleet_power < 5000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 40 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 20 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 1900
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 5000
									fleet_power < 10000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 50 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 30 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 3500
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 10000
									fleet_power < 25000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 75 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 40 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 6300
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 25000
									fleet_power < 50000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 50 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 11500
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 50000
									fleet_power < 100000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 150 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 75 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 21900
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 100000
									fleet_power < 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 200 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 100 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 45800
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 300 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 150 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 80000
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { # угроза - сильный сосед
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_at_war = no
								any_neighbor_country = {
									#has_communications = root
									is_country_type = default
									OR = {
										is_homicidal = yes
										AND = {
											is_rival = root
											relative_power = {
												who = root
												category = fleet
												value >= equivalent
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								has_global_flag = gray_goo_crisis_active
								NOT = {
									has_global_flag = graygoo_defeated
								}
							}
							AND = {
								has_global_flag = marauder_crisis_started
								NOT = {
									has_global_flag = great_khan_dead
								}
							}
							has_global_flag = war_in_heaven_ongoing
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power < 2000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 15 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 5 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 1500
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 2000
									fleet_power < 5000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 20 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 10 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 2850
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 5000
									fleet_power < 10000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 25 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 15 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 5250
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 10000
									fleet_power < 25000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 40 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 20 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 9450
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 25000
									fleet_power < 50000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 50 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 25 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 17250
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 50000
									fleet_power < 100000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 75 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 40 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 32850
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 100000
									fleet_power < 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 50 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 68700
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 150 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 75 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 120000
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { # кризис - война с сильным противником
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_at_war = yes
								any_war = {
									any_war_participant = {
										is_at_war_with = root
										relative_power = {
											who = root
											category = fleet
											value >= equivalent
										}
									}
								}
							}
							has_global_flag = crisis_stage_1
							has_global_flag = crisis_stage_2
							has_global_flag = crisis_stage_3
							has_global_flag = crisis_stage_4
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power < 2000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 10 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 5 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 2000
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 2000
									fleet_power < 5000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 15 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 7 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 3800
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 5000
									fleet_power < 10000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 20 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 10 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 7000
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 10000
									fleet_power < 25000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 25 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 15 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 12600
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 25000
									fleet_power < 50000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 35 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 20 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 23000
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 50000
									fleet_power < 100000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 50 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 25 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 43800
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 100000
									fleet_power < 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 75 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 35 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 91600
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = {
									fleet_power >= 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 50 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value <= 160000
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			} # конец проверки
			
			log = "[Root.GetName]: сделал покупку флота."
			save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rent_slot_5_buyer
			
			# передача флота и денег
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = { 
				set_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rent_slot_5_buyer
				set_event_locked = no
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_5_buyer = { 
				set_timed_country_flag = { flag = ftm_ai_sell_block_time days = 1800 }
				set_timed_country_flag = { flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time days = 450 }
			
				# снятие ресурсов при покупке			
		
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
					set_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_lot_cost
						value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
					}
				}	
				while = {
					count = 99
					if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_lot_cost
									value >= 10000
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -10000 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_lot_cost
								value = -10000
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_lot_cost
									value >= 1000
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -1000 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_lot_cost
								value = -1000
							}		
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_lot_cost
									value >= 100
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -100 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_lot_cost
								value = -100
							}
						}					
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_lot_cost
									value >= 10
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -10 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_lot_cost
								value = -10
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_lot_cost
									value >= 1
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -1 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_lot_cost
								value = -1
							}					
						}
					}
					else = {
						#nothing
					}
				}	
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.512 }
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_selected	
			set_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_arended	
		}
	}
}






# 80 - ежегодная проверка условий продажи для ии
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.580
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_selected
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_arended
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_in_progress
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = ftm_rent_not_can_use_ai_sale
		}
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = crisis_stage_1
				has_global_flag = crisis_stage_2
				has_global_flag = crisis_stage_3
				has_global_flag = crisis_stage_4
				AND = {
					has_global_flag = gray_goo_crisis_active
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = graygoo_defeated
					}
				}
				AND = {
					has_global_flag = marauder_crisis_started
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = great_khan_dead
					}
				}
				has_global_flag = war_in_heaven_ongoing
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_selected
						has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_arended
						has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_in_progress
					}
				}
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ftm_ai_sell_block_time
					}
					is_ai = yes
					is_country_type = default
					is_at_war = no
					used_naval_capacity_percent > 0.8
					resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value < 50000 }
					NOT = {
						any_neighbor_country = {
							#has_communications = root
							is_country_type = default
							OR = {
								is_homicidal = yes
								is_rival = root
								opinion = {
									who = ROOT
									value < -50
								}
								their_opinion = {
									who = ROOT
									value < -50
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rent_slot_5_num_fleet_count
					value = 0
				}
				every_owned_fleet = {
					limit = {
						fleet_power > 2000
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							}
						}
					}
					owner = {
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_num_fleet_count
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_5_num_fleet_count
							value > 2
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.581 days = 8 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.581 days = 38 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.581 days = 68 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.581 days = 98 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.581 days = 128 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.581 days = 158 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.581 days = 188 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.581 days = 218 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.581 days = 248 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.581 days = 278 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.581 days = 308 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.581 days = 338 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}


# 81 - выставление флота на продажу (ИИ)
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.581
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_selected
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_arended
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_in_progress
				has_country_flag = ftm_ai_sell_block_time
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
								has_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5
								has_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5

								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -34000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 100
								years_passed < 150
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -88000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 150
								years_passed < 200
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -125000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 200
								years_passed < 250
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -190000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 250
								years_passed < 300
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -220000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 300
								years_passed < 350
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -250000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 350
								years_passed < 400
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -270000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 400
								years_passed < 450
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -280000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 450
								years_passed < 500
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -290000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 500
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -300000
							}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						fleet_power >= 1000000
					}
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
							value = 500000
						}
						while = {
							count = 99
							random_list = {
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
											value < 450000
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value = -900
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
											value < 450000
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value = -500
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
											value < 450000
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value = -300
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
											value < 450000
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value = -200
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
											value < 450000
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value = -100
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
											value > 505000
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value = 100
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
											value > 505000
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value = 200
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
											value > 505000
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value = 300
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
											value > 505000
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value = 500
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
											value > 505000
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
										value = 900
									}
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 50
								years_passed < 100
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -36000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 100
								years_passed < 150
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -92000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 150
								years_passed < 200
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -130000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 200
								years_passed < 250
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -200000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 250
								years_passed < 300
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -240000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 300
								years_passed < 350
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -260000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 350
								years_passed < 400
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -280000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 400
								years_passed < 450
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -300000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 450
								years_passed < 500
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -310000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								years_passed >= 500
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_cost
								value = -320000
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_5_selected
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.504 }
			event_target:ftm_rent_country = { 
				create_leader = {
					class = admiral
					species = random
					name = random
					skill = 1
				}
			}
			last_created_leader = { 
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rent_country_temp_admiral 
				set_age = 20
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5 = { 
				set_leader = event_target:ftm_rent_country_temp_admiral
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rent_country
				set_event_locked = yes
				fleet_event = { id = ftm_rent.599 }
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_country_temp_admiral = { 
				kill_leader = { show_notification = no }
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rent_slot_5_time_in_months
				value = 60
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_renttime
				value = 12
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_renttime
						value = 3
					}
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_renttime
						value = 6
					}
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_renttime
						value = 9
					}
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_renttime
						value = 12
					}
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_renttime
						value = 15
					}
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_renttime
						value = 18
					}
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_renttime
						value = 24
					}
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_renttime
						value = 30
					}
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_renttime
						value = 36
					}
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_renttime
						value = 48
					}
				}
			}
			set_timed_country_flag = { flag = ftm_ai_sell_block_time days = 1800 }
			set_timed_country_flag = { flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time days = 900 }
		}
	}
}








# 98 - сообщение-уведомление о конце аренды
fleet_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.598
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		every_country = {
			limit = { is_country_type = default }
			create_message = {
				type = TRADE_DEAL_END_TIMEOUT
				localization = FTM_RENT_SLOT_5_NOTIFICATION_END
				days = 30
				target = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5
				variable = {
					type = name
					localization = FLEET
					scope = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5
				}
			}
		}
	}		
}



# 99 - сообщение-уведомление
fleet_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.599
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		every_country = {
			limit = { is_country_type = default }
			create_message = {
				type = EVENT_MESSAGE_TYPE
				localization = FTM_RENT_SLOT_5_NOTIFICATION
				days = 30
				target = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5
				variable = {
					type = name
					localization = COUNTRY
					scope = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5_seller
				}
				variable = {
					type = name
					localization = FLEET
					scope = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5
				}
			}
		}
	}		
}
