# 1 - окно выбора флота для аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.601
	title = "ftm_rent.601.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.601.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_02
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_02_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_02 
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_02
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_03
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_03_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_02 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_03
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_02 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_03
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_04
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_04_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_02 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_03
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_04
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_02 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_03
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_04
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_05
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_05_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller
		log = "[Root.GetName] запустил аренда флота"
		set_variable = {
			which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual
			value = 100
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 1
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.601.fleet_01
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.601.fleet_01.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01 
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 1 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_01 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.602 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 2
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.601.fleet_02
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.601.fleet_02.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_02
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 2 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_02.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_02 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.602 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 3
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.601.fleet_03
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.601.fleet_03.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_03
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 3 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_03.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_03 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.602 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 4
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.601.fleet_04
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.601.fleet_04.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_04
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 4 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_04.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_04 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.602 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 5
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.601.fleet_05
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.601.fleet_05.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_05 
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 5 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_05.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_05 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.602 }
		}
	}
		
	# передумал
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.601.nope
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал передумал продавать флот"
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_6_in_progress	
		}
	}
	
}





# 2 - ручная настройка стартовой цены аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.602
	title = "ftm_rent.602.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.602.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	# -10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.602.minus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.602.minus10000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual
				value >= 10001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual
				value = -10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.602 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller.GetName] снижает цену на 10000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# -1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.602.minus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.602.minus1000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual
				value >= 1001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual
				value = -1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.602 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller.GetName] снижает цену на 1000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# -100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.602.minus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.602.minus100.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual
				value >= 101
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual
				value = -100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.602 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller.GetName] снижает цену на 100 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# +100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.602.plus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.602.plus100.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual
				value = 100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.602 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller.GetName] увеличивает цену на 100 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# +1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.602.plus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.602.plus1000.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual
				value = 1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.602 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller.GetName] увеличивает цену на 1000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# +10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.602.plus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.602.plus10000.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual
				value = 10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.602 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller.GetName] увеличивает цену на 10000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# done
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.602.done
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.602.done.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			# счетчик текущей цены
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost
				value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost_manual
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value = 12
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.606 }
			log = "[Root.GetName] выставляет флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6.GetFleetName] на аренда за стартовую цену: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost]. Нужно выбрать срок аренды"
		}
	}
	
	
	
}





# 3 - запрос подтверждения продажи
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.603
	title = "ftm_rent.603.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.603.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6
		
	# подтвердить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.603.confirm
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.603.confirm.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] подтверждает продажу флота [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6.GetFleetName] через аренду"
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.604 }
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_6_in_progress
			set_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_6_selected
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6 = { 
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rent_country
				set_event_locked = yes
				fleet_event = { id = ftm_rent.699 }
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rent_slot_6_time_in_months
				value = 60
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = root modifier = ftm_rent_sanction }
				}
				set_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_6_sanction_block
			}
		}
	}
		
	# отказаться
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.603.nope
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал передумал выставлять флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6.GetFleetName] на аренду"
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_6_in_progress	
		}
	}
	
}





# 4 - выставление на продажу
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.604
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
	
		# ОБНУЛЕНИЕ СЧЕТЧИКОВ
		event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
			# корветы (corvette)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_corvette_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# эсминцы (destroyer)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_destroyer_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# крейсера (cruiser)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cruiser_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# линкоры (battleship)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_battleship_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# титаны (titan)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_titan_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
		}
		
		# ПРИСВОЕНИЕ СЧЕТЧИКОВ		
		
		# корветы (corvette)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_corvette_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6 
				}
			}	
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_corvette_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# эсминцы (destroyer)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_destroyer_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6 
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_destroyer_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# крейсера (cruiser)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_cruiser_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6 
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cruiser_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# линкоры (battleship)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_battleship_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6 
				}
				
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_battleship_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# титаны (titan)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_titan_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6 
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = {
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_titan_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}





# 5 - сообщение при недостатке энергии для покупки
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.605
	title = "ftm_rent.605.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.605.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.605.ok
	}
}





# 6 - настройка срока аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.606
	title = "ftm_rent.606.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.606.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	# -12
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.606.minus12
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.606.minus12.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value >= 24
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value = -12
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.606 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller.GetName] снижает срок аренды на 12 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# -6
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.606.minus6
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.606.minus6.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value >= 18
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value = -6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.606 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller.GetName] снижает срок аренды на 6 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# -3
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.606.minus3
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.606.minus3.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value >= 15
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value = -3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.606 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller.GetName] снижает срок аренды на 3 месяца. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# +3
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.606.plus3
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.606.plus3.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value <= 57
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value = 3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.606 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller.GetName] повышает срок аренды на 3 месяца. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# +6
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.606.plus6
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.606.plus6.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value <= 54
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value = 6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.606 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller.GetName] повышает срок аренды на 6 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# +12
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.606.plus12
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.606.plus12.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value <= 48
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
				value = 12
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.606 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller.GetName] повышает срок аренды на 12 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# done
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.606.done
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.606.done.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			# счетчик текущего срока аренды
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.603 }
			log = "[Root.GetName] выставляет флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6.GetFleetName] на аренду за цену: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_cost] на срок: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime] месяцев. Нужно подтверждение"
		}
	}
}





# 8 - обратный отсчет счетчика времени срока аренды
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.608
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_6_arended
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
						value >= 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
					value = -1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_renttime
						value < 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6 = {
				remove_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_sleet_slot_6
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller
				fleet_event = { id = ftm_rent.698 }
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.614 }
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_6_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.614 }
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_6_arended
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_6_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_6_sanction_block
			}
		}
	}
}





# 9 - обратный отсчет счетчика времени слота
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.609
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_6_selected
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rent_slot_6_time_in_months
						value >= 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rent_slot_6_time_in_months
					value = -1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rent_slot_6_time_in_months
						value < 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6 = { 
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller
				set_event_locked = no
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.613 }
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_6_selected
		}
	}
}





# 10 - сообщение с информацией о флоте
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.610
	title = "ftm_rent.610.title"
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
			}
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.610.desc"
	}
	# mods
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.610.desc_mod"
	}
	picture = GFX_evt_fleet_neutral 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.610.ok
	}
}

country_event = {

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
			}
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.611.desc"
	}
	# mods

		trigger = {
			ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.611.desc_mod"
	}
	picture = GFX_evt_signing 
	is_triggered_only = yes
